*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Cherokee Indian chiefs, May 8, 1826. Withdrawing plans for war against Waco and Tahuacano Indians.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*I wrote you by *person_mentioned*Mr Foster*/person_mentioned* requesting that the *person_mentioned*Cherokees */person_mentioned*would aid me in attacking the *person_mentioned*Wacos */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Tawakanies */person_mentioned*on the *date_mentioned n="05-25-1826">25 of this month*/date_mentioned*, I have this day recd an order from the superior *person_mentioned*Government*/person_mentioned*, directing me to suspend the meditated attack as it appears those *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*wish for peace and there will be no necessity of going to war with them—The *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*do not wish for war with any *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*and more especially with their *person_mentioned*neighbors */person_mentioned*and as it is likely that a peace will be made between them and us I have abandoned the idea of attacking them and do not wish you to act under the letter which I wrote you by *person_mentioned*Mr Foster*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I should be happy to hear from you and that you would inform me if I can befriend you in any way—I hope the *person_mentioned*Cherokees */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Americanos */person_mentioned*will live as one people—*/p*
*p*P. S. three *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*were seen in this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*a few days ago supposed to be *person_mentioned*Keechies */person_mentioned*or some of those *person_mentioned*horse-stealing tribes */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*neighborhood */location_mentioned*and I am this moment informed that a number of horses are missing—I must request the favor of you to try and find out if any of those *person_mentioned*tribes */person_mentioned*have any stolen horses and to take possession of them and send me word.*/p*
*p*If no peace is made and the war should go on I will let you know by express for if there is a war I shall calculate on your aid—*/p*
*p*[Note on letter:] The above is copy of letter to *person_mentioned*cherokees */person_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-08-1826">may 8 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
